verses.text: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* favour \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w some|strong="H0376"\w* uncleanness: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bill \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w divorce|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w departed|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* marrieth \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H0176"\w* hateth \w her|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* bill \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w divorce|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8441"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: lest thou \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w possess|strong="H1167"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath lately \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* public \w business|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* enjoined \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w free|strong="H5355"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* fault, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H2254"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nether, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w upper|strong="H7393"\w* \w millstone|strong="H7393"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* pledge: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath pledged \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* thee.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* soliciting \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w selling|strong="H4376"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* take \w a|strong="H3588"\w* price, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt take \w away|strong="H1589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thee.

\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w diligently|strong="H3966"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou incur not \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leprosy|strong="H6883"\w*, \w but|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* race \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee, according \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* fulfill thou \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w carefully|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Mary, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt demand \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy neighbour \w any|strong="H3972"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* oweth thee, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w away|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w pledge|strong="H5667"\w*:

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* \w then|strong="H3318"\w* shalt \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* without, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w pledge|strong="H5667"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lodge \w with|strong="H0376"\w* thee \w that|strong="H1931"\w* night,

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* thou shalt \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* presently \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*: \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* raiment \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou mayst \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* hire \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w whether|strong="H0176"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelleth \w with|strong="H0776"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* price \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* labour \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* maintaineth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: lest \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* reputed \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pervert|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w take|strong="H2254"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w widowâ€™s|strong="H0490"\w* raiment \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w a|strong="H5186"\w* pledge.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou wast \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w delivered|strong="H6299"\w* thee \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thence. \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast reaped \w the|strong="H3605"\w* corn \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast \w forgot|strong="H7911"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sheaf|strong="H6016"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w suffer|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* tabs \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* return \w to|strong="H1961"\w* gather whatsoever remaineth \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w trees|strong="H2132"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* shalt leave \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w and|strong="H2132"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* vintage \w of|strong="H3754"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gather|strong="H1219"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* clusters \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w and|strong="H3754"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w also|strong="H0853"\w* wast \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bondman \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.
